snippet: The reopening of the Board of Officers Room will offer the public a look at the Park Avenue Armory restoration process, and a preservation philosophy that accepts flaws and signs of age.
abstract: Roberta Smith observes that the reopening of the Board of Officers Room at the landmark Park Avenue Armory is the first fruit of the armory's ambitious renovation project, which is scheduled to be completed in 2018; notes that room will offer the public a look at the armory's restoration process and a preservation philosophy that accepts flaws and signs of age.
lead_paragraph: The reopening of the Board of Officers Room will offer the public a look at the Park Avenue Armory restoration process, and a preservation philosophy that accepts flaws and signs of age.

headline.print_headline: Ornate Peek At a Refreshed Gilded Age
headline.seo: Restored Board of Officers Room Is to Open at the Armory
headline.main: Ornate Peek at a Refreshed Gilded Age
